column4: i get a "no versions of ndiswrapper found" error when i try to use it :S ndiswrapper-utils and -common are installed and i believe i do have the kernel module... any ideas?
please go through the ndiswrapper verification process here first http://www.linuxhomenetworking.com/wiki/index.php/Quick_HOWTO_:_Ch13_:_Linux_Wireless_Networking
i couldnt really care more/less about 16 grumpy 40 year olds who're quite inflexible :)
